{{album | image = The_Lord_of_the_Rings_-_The_Rings_of_Power_(Season_One_-_Amazon_Original_Series_Soundtrack).jpg | title=The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
(Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack) | type=Soundtrack | artist=[[Bear McCreary]] | released=[[19 August]], [[2022]] | genre= | length=156 minutes | language= | label= }}'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)''''' is an album which was composed by [[Bear McCreary]] for the first season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' television series. It was released online on [[19 August]], [[2022]] by Amazon Music. ==Contents== # [[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Main Title]] (composed by [[Howard Shore]]) (1:33) # [[Where the Shadows Lie]] (featuring [[Fiona Apple]]) (3:49) # [[Harfoot Life]] (2:21) # [[Bronwyn and Arondir]] (2:47) # [[Halbrand (soundtrack)|Halbrand]] (2:55) # [[The Boat]] (4:08) # [[Sundering Seas (soundtrack)|Sundering Seas]] (2:41) # [[Nobody Goes Off Trail]] (4:25) # [[Elendil and Isildur]] (4:16) # [[White Leaves]] (4:41) # [[The Secrets of the Mountain]] (3:49) # [[Nolwa Mahtar]] (2:02) # [[Nampat]] (2:34) # [[A Plea to the Rocks]] (featuring [[Sophia Nomvete]]) (3:47) # [[This Wandering Day]] (featuring [[Megan Richards]]) (2:10) # [[Scherzo for Violins and Swords]] (1:52) # [[Sailing into the Dawn]] (4:18) # [[Find the Light]] (Amazon Music exclusive) (3:27) # [[For the Southlands]] (4:32) #
